name: Bomber Me
description:
Bomber Me (2020)

A little game made for the Nokia 3310 Jam (https://itch.io/jam/nokiajam2)

84x48 pixel, 2 colors!

You are the bomb!
Move with ARROW KEYS! 
Set your countdown with FIRE! (CTRL)
You'll respawn in the last position after the explosion! 
Destroy all enemies with your explosion! 
Clear all levels!
